meanings.definition: A group of six people or things.
meanings.sent1: At the party, a sextet of friends played a game together.
meanings.sent2: The sextet of colorful balloons floated in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The sextet of puppies wagged their tails in unison.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a sextet of flowers, each one unique.
meanings.sent5: The sextet of books on the shelf caught her eye.

meanings.definition: A musical composition for six voices or instruments.
meanings.sent1: The talented musicians performed a beautiful sextet at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The classical composer wrote a challenging sextet for the orchestra.
meanings.sent3: The sextet of birds chirped a melodious tune in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The sextet of colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent5: The sextet of strings resonated throughout the hall.
